Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN PA The assets costs are not interfacing to FA - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN PA The assets costs are not interfacing to FA - Weekly
Source.Description: For mismatch of amounts in asset lines where current asset costs does not match with original asset costs.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_PA_CAP_MISMATCH_ASSET_COSTS' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'project_id:' || s.project_id || ', project_asset_line_detail_id:' || s.project_asset_line_detail_id || ', original_asset_cost:' || s.original_asset_cost || ', current_asset_cost:' || s.current_asset_cost || ', task_id:' || s.task_id key_data FROM (SELECT project_id project_id, project_asset_line_detail_id project_asset_line_detail_id, original_asset_cost original_asset_cost, crnt_ast_cost current_asset_cost, task_id task_id FROM ( SELECT al.project_id, al.project_asset_line_detail_id, al.original_asset_cost , sum(al.current_asset_cost) crnt_ast_cost, al.task_id FROM apps.pa_project_asset_lines_all al, apps.pa_projects_all p WHERE al.project_id = p.project_id AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM apps.pa_project_asset_line_details ald WHERE ald.reversed_flag = 'N' AND ald.project_asset_line_detail_id = al.project_asset_line_detail_id) AND TRUNC(al.creation_date) > SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY al.project_id, al.project_asset_line_detail_id, al.original_asset_cost, al.task_id HAVING sum(al.current_asset_cost) <> al.original_asset_cost ) WHERE rownum <= 6) s
